description:
Toshihide wakes up one day and learns he has a very rare and incurable disease. Now that he has turned into a beautiful girl, he becomes the target of the boys` harassment. When Akira, his girlfriend`s brother, comes to his rescue, Toshihide realizes he might be attracted to Akira. In this confusing situation, Toshihide and his girlfriend must decide what will become of their relationship.
Source: Prime Video

titles.title: Me ga Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou
目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病
